Personal Information
Name: Arafat Hossain Ankon

Portfolio Link: https://ankon35.github.io/Ankon-Porfolio
LinkedIn Link: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ankonhossain
Career Objective
As a passionate and detail-oriented individual with a strong foundation in business analytics
and data-driven problem solving, Ankon is eager to apply his knowledge and utilize his skills
in SQL, Python, Excel, Power BI, and Machine Learning Models to analyze and interpret data.
He is committed to continuous learning and adapting to dynamic business challenges.
Education

B.Sc. in Software Engineering (Major in Data Science), Daffodil International University
(CGPA: 3.92/4.00)
Technical Skills
Languages: Python, SQL, HTML, CSS
Libraries & Frameworks: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib,

Here is a 3-sentence summary of the text:
